revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: ". . . and the . . . container in which are three measures of dates, and from the son of Kalamaus for the children one measure of dates. Send me the . . . and the iron tools and 8 silver drachmas and 4 bronze drachmas. Write to me about the sandals for Bereis and for you. One pair is being made for each of you. Expect me by the 10th of next month together with the animals. If Sarapous desires anything of what I sent, give it to her, and salute her, Theonas, all those at home, and little Sarapous. Farewell.;Sixth year of Imperator Caesar Domitianus Augustus Germanicus, Hathyr 15."

listBibl.bibl: Youtie H C, ZPE 34, 90-92, 1979, Pl. VIIa -- SB XVI,12578 -- BL IX, 287 on l. 9.
